title: Roy Rogers Rides: Hands Across the Border (1944) Romance & Rodeo Rhythms

sources.title: Roy Rogers Rides: Hands Across the Border (1944) Romance & Rodeo Rhythms
sources.description:
Horse breeders Adams and Brock are vying for the Army contract. After Adams is killed trying to ride his horse Trigger, Roy saves him from being shot. He trains him and then plans to ride him in the race to win the contract.

Alternative title: Appointment at the Border (1944)

Director: Joseph Kane
Writers: Bradford Ropes, J. Benton Cheney
Stars: Roy Rogers, Ruth Terry, & Trigger the horse
Genres: Western, Musical
Released Jan 5, 1944
Filming location:  California


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics
